# Pre-Assembly 

## Unzip 
In the folder with your raw `fastq.gz`
```{bash, highlight=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
gunzip *.gz
```

## Interleaving 
I used the script <font color='green'>interleave_fastq.py</font> from this [GitHub gist](https://gist.github.com/ngcrawford/2232505). You can also copy the script from the folder Script Métagénomique of our Teams.

Make the script executable and run the script using python 
```{bash, highlight=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
chmod +x interleave_fastq.py
python3 interleave_fastq.py 
```

**Quite long, maybe run with nohup ?** 

looping if you have multiple files 
```{bash, highlight=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
for R1 in *_R1_001.fastq ; do python3 interleave_fastq.py $R1 "${R1/R1/R2}"  > ok.fastq ; done 
```
